Crimes.Crime_Name: Misrepresentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the immigration officer erred in concluding misrepresentation based on bone age tests
Crimes.Review_Court: Federal Court (implied by judicial review context)
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant's documentation deemed consistent and credible
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Section 40(1) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act (misrepresentation)
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Reliance on imprecise bone age testing over documentary evidence
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to consider reliable documentary evidence
Evidence_Ignored: Consistent birth dates across official documents
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Misrepresentation involving material facts under IRPA
Crimes.Application_Factor: Use of scientific testing with known margin of error
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Finding of inadmissibility based on misrepresentation
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Reasonableness of reliance on inconclusive medical tests
Crimes.Outcome_of_Review: Remanded for reconsideration by a different officer
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Perceived discrepancy in age based on bone testing
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Conflict between documentary evidence and medical estimation
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Concerns about fair assessment of evidence
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Lack of proper evidentiary foundation for adverse finding
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to account for reliability of primary documents

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the officer’s conclusion of misrepresentation was patently unreasonable
Crimes.Review_Court: Federal Court (implied by judicial review context)
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant's documentation found consistent and trustworthy
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Section 40(1) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Allegation that applicant misrepresented children's ages
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Overreliance on non-definitive bone age assessments
Evidence_Ignored: Uniformity of birth dates in official records
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Validity of using imprecise tests to infer fraud
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Suspected age misstatement based on bone testing
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Contradiction between hard documents and medical estimates
Crimes.Document_Fraud: No evidence of forged or altered documents
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Insufficient justification for rejecting documentary evidence
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to validate scientific evidence against primary sources
